description:
Some days the voice fails you but the creativity flourishes... This was one such day as my voice gave out. John Henry gladly stepped up to the plate to torment his personal slave Charlotte.
Charlotte submits to VERY strict bamboo bondage at the hands of John Henry. This natural tall grass is so unrelenting as Charlotte struggles to keep her composure as orgasm after orgasm is ripped from her body. Tight rope, tight clips & predicaments are all she can focus on.
title: Charlotte submits to the bamboo...
